text: Boquhan is a hamlet in Stirling, Scotland, sometimes known as Wester Boquhan to distinguish it from the other nearby Boquhan, near Kippen. The hamlet lies southwest of the village of Balfron and northeast of Killearn. Just east of Boquhan is Boquhan Old House which dates from 1784. Boquhan is in the catchment area for Balfron Primary School and Balfron High School. == References == ==External links== *Scottish Places - Boquhan *Canmore - Boquhan Old House Category:Hamlets in Stirling (council area)
title: Boquhan
